metadata.name: Rainwater #1
metadata.description:
The Park is a group of friends, musicians, artists, producers, collaborators, instigators, and dance floor starters from the country of California.

Here to speak artist to artist and help revalue music together. 

Change takes time, The Park is here for you, URL in the discords, IRL on the road from Madison Square garden to that seedy dive bar, in the coffee shop, talking to friends, doing work together on the daily. 

Talking about change, Tess Henley shares: “Rainwater is about regeneration and renewing one’s self through life’s challenges. Everyone goes through change. For an artist or creative, regeneration almost seems to be in the DNA. It’s exciting that this song is part of a community of people who are thinking about this need and putting it into action.” Web3 + Music NFT’s are that action for The Park and fellow artists creating new realities together on chain. We thank you for listening

Josh Lippi - Bass, guitar 
Ben Schwier - keys, piano, synths
Tess Henley- Vocals, Keys, programming 
Derek Taylor - drums, percussion, organelle 
Tim Anderson - guitar, Juno 6, mix, master, vocoder 

RAINWATER
I am green 
I am a fragile being
I am grown in grace 
Bare the scars on my face 

Who you wish to see
Wont always be
What makes me 
Unapologetically free 

Anyone to be
But I need you more

Take a minute to see
What I love you for 

They call her 
Rainwater
They call her
Rainwater
Washed over and over anew
In everything true
They call her 
Rainwater
They call her
Rainwater
Washed over and over anew
In everything true
Rainwater 
Rainwater
Washed over and over anew
In everything true
